in.srain.cube.image

Class ImageTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.srain.cube.image.ImageTask

  • public class ImageTask
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper of the related information used in loading a bitmap

        public java.lang.String getIdentityUrl()

      • generateIdentityUrl

        @Deprecated
protected java.lang.String generateIdentityUrl(java.lang.String originUrl)
        Deprecated. Do not overwrite this method, use NameGenerator instead. should be used.
        In some situations, we may store the same image in some different servers. So the same image will related to some different urls. Generate the identity url according your situation. mIdentityUrl
        Returns:

      • generateIdentityKey

        protected java.lang.String generateIdentityKey()
        Generate the identity key.

        This key should be related to the unique image this task is requesting: the size, the remote url.

        Returns:
